title: Mindblowing Python GIL
description:
Mindblowing Python GIL

Presented by David Beazley at ChiPy on June 11, 2009

David Beazley: mind-blowing presentation about how the Python GIL
actually works and why it's even worse than most people even imagine.

Slides: http://www.dabeaz.com/python/GIL.pdf
